tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE security_incidents (
    incident_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    incident_date DATE,
    incident_type VARCHAR(100),
    affected_system VARCHAR(100),
    description TEXT,
    investigator_id INT,
    CONSTRAINT fk_investigator_id FOREIGN KEY (investigator_id) REFERENCES investigators (investigator_id)
);

CREATE TABLE security_incidents (
    incident_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    incident_date DATE,
    description TEXT,
    severity_level VARCHAR(255),
    reporter_name VARCHAR(255)
);

CREATE TABLE breach_records (
    breach_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    incident_id INT REFERENCES security_incidents(incident_id),
    breach_date DATE,
    breach_type VARCHAR(255),
    affected_records INT
);

CREATE TABLE security_incidents (
    incident_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    date_occurred DATE,
    incident_type VARCHAR(50),
    description TEXT,
    affected_systems JSON
);

CREATE TABLE breach_records (
    breach_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    incident_id INT REFERENCES security_incidents(incident_id),
    date_discovered DATE,
    severity VARCHAR(20),
    affected_records INT
);

CREATE TABLE investigation_logs (
    log_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    incident_id INT REFERENCES security_incidents(incident_id),
    investigator VARCHAR(50),
    action_taken TEXT,
    investigation_notes TEXT
);

CREATE TABLE security_incidents (
    incident_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    incident_date DATE,
    incident_description TEXT,
    affected_entities TEXT,
    investigation_status TEXT
)

CREATE TABLE breach_reports (
    report_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    report_date DATE,
    reporting_party TEXT,
    affected_organization TEXT,
    breach_details TEXT
)

CREATE TABLE investigations (
    investigation_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    start_date DATE,
    end_date DATE,
    investigator TEXT,
    findings TEXT,
    conclusion TEXT
)

CREATE TABLE compliance_records (
    record_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    record_date DATE,
    organization TEXT,
    compliance_status TEXT
)
